column4: hey my panel at the top of the screen dissapeared after i enabled 3d desktop, how can i get it back?

restart gnome-panel perhaps? pkill gnome-panel first to kill it off properly.. perhaps it autostarts a new one.. perhaps you have to run gnome-panel manually
